Source.Name: patchelf
Source.Summary: A small utility to modify the dynamic linker and RPATH of ELF executables
Source.Description: PatchELF is a simple utility for modifying existing ELF executables and libraries. It can change the dynamic loader ("ELF interpreter") of executables, change or shrink the RPATH of executables and libraries, remove declared dependencies on dynamic libraries, and more.

Package.Name: patchelf
